author: hwright
msg: Avoid calling apr_stat with APR_FINFO_PROT | APR_FINFO_OWNER on
Windows, as this call is documented to be 'incredibly expensive, but
accurate' and the result is ignored anyway.
r33185 contains some documentation that should have been in r33178.
Doing costly calculations and then ignoring the result is not good.
This patch resolves two of these cases. The first by removing the
calculation and the second by disabling the code on Windows completely.

author: hwright
msg: Fix the current early bailout of 'svn log' as exhibited during
Server logic fault tolerance.  Code mo'-betta-ness.

author: julianfoad
msg: Untangle the cyclic calling between add_file() and add_file_with_history().
(add_file_with_history): Move to before add_file() (along with its
subroutines), remove the forward reference to it, and make it no longer
(add_file): Always do the normal work, and then call add_file_with_history()

author: lgo
msg: Use enum to define uri and dirent constants.
(path_type_t): New enum, add type_url for future use.
svn_dirent_canonicalize): Use type_[uri/dirent] instead of URI/DIRENT.

author: kfogel
msg: (ensure_ra_session_url): Redocument, with more precision this time.
